title: New: PWR BTTM – Big Beautiful Day
body:
LGBTQ punk extraordinaires PWR BTTM return with a Valentines Day release for their new album, Pageant_._

_ Big Beautiful Day_ has everything you’d want from a PWR BTTM track with energetic drums, infectious guitar melodies, and of course the hella empowering lyrics. Driven by an almost fearless self-confidence the song tackles the often daunting task of ignoring the words of  close minded men. Lines such as “my advice is to look incredible as you make their lives regrettable by being your damn self” and “curse everyone of you for telling me I cannot be who I want” instill the ultra possitive theme throughout and build excitement for the bands full project out on May 12th.
